io.hekate.metrics.local

Interface TimerMetric

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Metric

    public interface TimerMetric
extends Metric
    Metric for tracking the duration of an arbitrary event.

    Timers can be registered within the LocalMetricsService either at configuration time or dynamically at runtime. Once registered they can be accessed via the LocalMetricsService.timer(String) method.

    For more details about metric types and their usage please see the documentation of LocalMetricsService interface.

    See Also:
    LocalMetricsService, TimerConfig
